manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CURVED FOR YOUR VIEWING PLEASURE Optix monitors use a curved display panel that has a curvature rate of 1500R, which is the most comfortable and suitable for a wide range of applications from general computing to gaming. Curved panels also help with gameplay immersion, making you feel more connected to the entire experience.

Previous page THE BEAUTY IS IN THE DETAILS MSI gaming monitor feature a UHD panel that supports resolution up to 3840x2160. With a super narrow bezel, enjoy the best immersion possible in the latest games. THE MOST VIVID DISPLAY Equipped with HDR technology that can produce images with more details and colors. 144 HZ + 1MS MSI gaming monitors are equipped with a 144Hz refresh rate + 1ms response time VA LED panel. Next page 1 4K UHD 2 Edge to Edge 3 HDR Ready 4 144 HZ + 1MS

Previous page TEAR FREE, STUTTER FREE, FLUID GAMING Get fluid, artifact-free performance at virtually any framerate with AMD FreeSync technology. NIGHT VISION MODE ENABLED Let MSI's smart black tuner brighten your day by bringing out the fine details in dark areas The built-in magnifier provides multi-stage zooming with shortcuts to quickly switch the zoom level. Next page 1 AMD FreeSync 2 Night Vision 3 Optix Scope

Previous page ANTI-FLICKER TECHNOLOGY This monitor provides a very comfortable viewing experience by reducing the amount of flicker. MSI monitors reduce the total amount of blue light displayed so you can game longer without fatigue. Next page 1 Anti-Flicker 2 Blue Light Reduction

Previous page USB TYPE-C Power your devices (up to 15W), effortlessly connect to any compatible device for data transfer. HDMI 2.1 & 4K With HDMI 2.1 built in, flawlessly view 4k video and games at up to 144hz. Next page 1 I/O PORTS 2 USB TYPE-C 3 HDMI 2.1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value so far! No dead pixels!
reviews.reviewText: Looks great so far, and no dead pixels - my biggest fear when buying a monitor.I notice that this monitor is a bit dim because I have to set the brightness and contrast to 70, compared to other monitors where I set to 40 and 70 would be too bright. But, since I am still able to find a brightness level that works for me, I like it.Picture quality looks good so far, but given that I am coming from a 27" 1440 144hz monitor, it should look better.The included stand does not lift - it only tilts. On first usage it is somewhat awkward because the taskbar is much lower than I am used to (on 27" monitor). The top of the monitor is at a good height so for me tilt only is not a big demerit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quality of picture os amazing. The performance as well. Has so many options to set up for your preference + was the only one I found the manufacture date is April 2023 is recent, most of gaming monitors are older and MSI as far as I know works with Microsoft so is a Plus for Xbox users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price for the money. I think it is kind of incredible that I was able to purchase this kind of monitor for this price. The size is overwhelming. I purchased a 4090 earlier this year and have a fully built PC. A 4k 144Hz monitor is the last thing I was waiting on, but I was not going to spend the average market of $600+. I just kept waiting and this monitor delivers. The only negative thing I will say is that the stand allows for no adjustment at all, so if there are any bousie people that just have to have that, then they may want to get another stand. Of course.... that negates the whole point of being a good priced monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gorgeous colors, and astounding visuals. Turns out 3060ti can run a majority of games on 4K too. A lot of this can probably be chalked up to this being my first 4K, but it’s a massive improvement from my 2k. It is a lot, but there’s not many monitors that are curved, 4K, and have a higher-than-60htz. A bit expensive, but it’s worth it, especially for the QLED

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I guess you get what you pay for…
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this monitor for a little over a month now, and let me tell you it hasn’t been fun. I keep getting a black screen on intervals that occur every 30 seconds, and they’ll last anywhere in between 3-8 seconds. I’ve tried resetting the monitor, changing HDMI cables, changing ports in both the monitor and GPU, plugged it in to the outlet by itself and nothing seems to fix it. I’ll try reaching out to MSI, and go from there…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dead pixels…good value monitor otherwise
reviews.reviewText: Bought on sale for under $400 and used for about a week before a handful of dead pixels showed up. Amazing value and looked pretty good until this occurred. I can’t speak for other customers’ experiences and, given the majority of positive reviews, you may even have an entirely error free experience…but I went ahead and immediately sent it back for a refund. As the sale has now ended, I will likely be looking for monitors in other places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far has been great
reviews.reviewText: Bought this monitor a couple days ago and it was packaged great.So far no dead pixels luckily, but do have to play around with the settings to make it better.I would still recommend the monitor as it runs the games great so far such as d4 and cod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Overall I enjoy how high quality this monitor feels for a reasonable price. Many monitors with these features, 4k and 144hz, cost a lot more overall.

reviews.reviewTitle: Get it on sale and well worth it.
reviews.reviewText: Upgraded from 4k 60hz to this 4k 144hz and well worth it imo. I don't think the HDMI slot on this monitor supports 144hz but the DP one definitely does. Great for gaming, a bit of ghosting but this is a relatively low cost 4k 144hz monitor so I'm fine with that.
Lo llevo usando 1 mes y me ha parecido increíble
Currently using monitor for PS5 / Nintendo switch. Love the setup, works well, visually stunning.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice Monitor, but the HDMI cable from the box isn't working.
reviews.reviewText: The monitor is nice based on the price tag, but the only disappointment is the brand-new HDMI cable from the box isn't working. I switched to another cable to get everything working.
